name: ContractIQ
tag_list: outsourcing, marketplace, b2b, trust, intelligence, crowdsourcing
description: Vendor Discover Platform for IT Services
overview:
ContractIQ is where small & medium businesses go, to discover, evaluate and engage with IT service provider(s), that fit their context the best.

Our proposition for providers:

ContractIQ is fixing the lack of space to establish trust in competitive bid situations. Build your ‘IQ Profile’ - a comprehensive profile that touches 30 aspects that differentiate you from your competitor. The next time you speak to a prospect, do so with an endorsement that has no match!

Our proposition for buyers:

Outsourcing never ceases to spring a surprise even from an accomplished startup guy like you.

ContractIQ is fixing it, one vendor at a time. We discover vendors, then their customers and dig deep into why they like each other and how that has reflected in the company’s performance. Besides, there are 30 dimensions on which you can profile a vendor. We do that. We do that even with ‘your’ shortlist, so that you get not only the data, but contextual intelligence before you dive in.

milestones.description: Founded in Spring 2011, as a part of Founder Institute Singapore Program.
